user_profile.name: Evelyn Carter
user_profile.description: Evelyn is a 30-year-old data analyst with a passion for optimizing her daily routines. Known for her analytical mindset and strong attention to detail, she prefers to use simple language in her communications, making complex information accessible to others. Currently juggling a busy lifestyle and facing time constraints, she is interested in setting medication reminders to enhance her health management efficiently, ensuring she never misses a dose despite her sedentary habits.

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Setting daily medication reminders while on the go
Receiving alerts for varying medication schedules
Tracking dosage and adherence over time
